content.raw:
Good catch! I managed to reproduce this issue on `default`, so it’s not related with this pull request. I’m looking into it because it seems to be triggered when the WAM-V is there. What we see is an internal Gazebo artifact around the origin used to generate laser data using the GPU. We can consider this a separate issue.

We were not seeing it before because the WAM-V was spawned at the origin and you have to look to the origin to reproduce it.
content.html:
Good catch! I managed to reproduce this issue on default, so it’s not related with this pull request. I’m looking into it because it seems to be triggered when the WAM-V is there. What we see is an internal Gazebo artifact around the origin used to generate laser data using the GPU. We can consider this a separate issue.

We were not seeing it before because the WAM-V was spawned at the origin and you have to look to the origin to reproduce it.
